advanced_cosmetic_dentistry.name: Paul A. Peterson - Advanced Cosmetic Dentistry
advanced_cosmetic_dentistry.subheader: Dental Practice in Park City, UT
advanced_cosmetic_dentistry.text: I was the primary front end developer on this website. Highlights include custom home and interior pages, video reel, fully responsive design, and a Before & After Gallery.

altlas_vein.name: Atlas Vein Care
altlas_vein.subheader: Vein Care Specialists located in Arlington, TX
altlas_vein.text: I was the primary front end developer on this website. Absolutely love the design for this site. It was a pleasure to watch it come to life.

belcor_builders.name: Belcor Buidlers, Inc
belcor_builders.text: This site came long before I started as a web developer.  While working as the Marketing & Sales Coordinator, I managed the company site's complete overhaul.

centerderm.name: Center for Dermatolgy & Laser Surgery
centerderm.text: This site has a ton of features. As one of the main developers on this project, I helped built the shopping cart funcitonality, home, service, and staff pages.

dental_phobia.name: Dental Phobia
dental_phobia.subheader: Dental Practice in New York, NY
dental_phobia.text: Fun unique design on this one. As one of the main developers for this project, I helped redesign the home and service pages. Also converted the site to be fully responsive.

dr_alison_black.name: Las Colinas Dermatology
dr_alison_black.text: I was the primary front end developer on this website. Highlights include custom home page, online store, and extensive photo editing and graphic artwork.

dr_maieve.name: Dra. Mai√©ve Corralo
dr_maieve.subheader: Plastic Surgeon practice in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
dr_maieve.text: I was the sole front end developer on this website.  Being able to speak Spanish, I was able to work around the Portuguese language quite easily.

eye_surgery_center.name: Eye Surgery Center of New Yorks
eye_surgery_center.subheader: Eye Care Specialists in the Bronx, NY
eye_surgery_center.text: I was one of the main front end developers for this site. General updates and maintenance.

galleria.name: Galleria Dental Aesthetics
galleria.subheader: Private Dental Practice in McLean, Va
galleria.text: As the primary developer for this website, I enjoyed laying out this beautiful design. This client had multiple custom pages and layouts made. Hightlights include iframe embedded throughout site, custom photo gallery (as well as photo editing), and patient testimonials page.

gentle_dental.name: Gentle Dental
gentle_dental.text: I was the primary front end developer on this website. Highlights include smile gallery and testimonials page.

mcdowell.name: McDowell Dental Group
mcdowell.text: I programmed the entire front end of this website. Features include photo gallery installation and design, image editing in Photoshop, custom design on "Our Team" page, working with the third-party Testimonials widget, and blog import and design.

priest_dental.name: Priest Dental
priest_dental.text: I was the primary front end developer on this website. Simple, UX friendly layout with a comforting blue theme.

retinal_san_antonio.name: Retinal Consultants of San Antonio
retinal_san_antonio.subheader: Opthamology practice in San Antonio, TX
retinal_san_antonio.text: I was the primary front end developer on this website. This was a responsive conversion, meaning the initial design for the site had already been implemented, but needed to be made responsive for mobile and tablet viewing.

retro_express.name: Retro-Express
retro_express.text: This was my final project for General Assembly.  Along with my partner, Spencer Denauski, we designed the game logic, 3 dimensional design, enemy generation, flight simulation, and all the other fun 3D stuff. This was my first try at developing in 3D, and I absolutely loved it!

schlessinger.name: Schlessinger Eye & Face
schlessinger.subheader: Private Dental Practice in Woodbury, NY
schlessinger.text: I was the primary front end developer on this project.  This client had a lot of media that we had to curate, edit, and insert into the site's inner pages.

smiles_4_a_lifetime.name: Smiles 4 A Lifetime
smiles_4_a_lifetime.subheader: Dental Practice in New York, NY
smiles_4_a_lifetime.text: I designed and built the photo gallery for this site.

static_address.name: Static Address
static_address.subheader: Music Media Sharing Web Application built with Ruby on Rails
static_address.text: Another project from my General Assembly days, along with my group we designed and built the entire site using Ruby on Rails, Soundcloud & Youtube widgets, and Postgres database.

tennessee_vein.name: The Tennessee Vein Center
tennessee_vein.text: I designed and created many of the inner pages of this site, including the photo gallery.

the_vein_clinic.name: TSRH Forum
the_vein_clinic.text: I designed and built the photo gallery for this site.

tsrh_home.name: TSRH Forum
tsrh_home.subheader: Web forum I built while attending General Assembly in NYC
tsrh_home.text: This was a fun one! I used Node.js along with Express, jQuery, SQLite3, and Foundation to build this one.

urogynecology_center.name: The Urogynecology Center
urogynecology_center.subheader: Urogynecology practice in Overland Park, KS
urogynecology_center.text: I was the primary front end developer on this website. Highlights include custom home page & FAQ section.
